article_title: Lightning vs. Original Six: Two Down, Two to Go
article_text:
Fans of the NHL’s Original Six franchises are licking their lips at a possible piece of history: the first-ever Stanley Cup Final pitting the Blackhawks and Rangers.

Chicago and New York, two of the four teams still standing in hockey’s playoffs, both started playing in 1926. Yet somehow they’ve never faced off with hardware on the line. All other possible Finals matchup combinations between the Original Six, which also includes...

twitter.description: Tampa Bay can become the first NHL team to eliminate four of the NHL’s six original franchises on the way to a Cup.
twitter.creator: @AdamTrot

article_summary:
All other possible Finals matchup combinations between the Original Six, which also includes...
Chicago and New York, two of the four teams still standing in hockey’s playoffs, both started playing in 1926.
Fans of the NHL’s Original Six franchises are licking their lips at a possible piece of history: the first-ever Stanley Cup Final pitting the Blackhawks and Rangers.
Yet somehow they’ve never faced off with hardware on the line.
